collection_metadata.name: FeatBit featbit-openfeature-js-client Evaluation Tests
collection_metadata.description: Evaluation test collection for featbit-openfeature-js-client skill

test_items.name: openfeature-js-provider-setup
test_items.description: Validates OpenFeature JavaScript provider setup with FeatBit for browser applications
test_items.input_task_prompt: I want to use FeatBit through OpenFeature in my browser application. How do I set up the OpenFeature provider and evaluate flags?
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- Install both @openfeature/web-sdk and @featbit/openfeature-provider-js-client
- Import FeatBitProvider
- OpenFeature.setProvider()
- OpenFeature.setContext() for user
- Client.getBooleanValue() for evaluation
- Provider configuration options

Evaluation Method:
1. Check both packages mentioned
2. Verify provider setup pattern
3. Confirm context setting
4. Check evaluation method
5. Verify OpenFeature API used

Pass Criteria:
- Correct packages installed
- Provider properly configured
- OpenFeature API used correctly
- User context set via OpenFeature
- Complete integration shown

Fail Criteria:
- Missing OpenFeature SDK
- Direct FeatBit SDK usage
- Incorrect provider setup
- No context configuration
